Everyone was very helpful and I enjoyed the experience. Very happy with my entire Bosley team.

Sep 23, 2021

Yes, I have been trying to get my original photos for about 2 years now. I filled out all the paperwork and submitted it ...I later followed up regarding the pictures and was told they emailed them to me ...I did not receive them and I did check my spam folder. Possibly the wrong email address was typed in originally. I have spoken since to a few others from the office and they said they would look into it. I never hear back. I want to share the improvement. The pictures will support that to those that ask me and my family wants to see the dramatic change . Can we please try and resend them or give them to me at my next upcoming appointment ?

Sep 23, 2021

Dr. Sunddleson was so good at customer service and treated me great. Dr. Tan who I had on my initial procedure barely was even in the room and did nothing but direct others. My initial results were not great, but I believe they will be great this time based on my experience.

Jan 16, 2016

The only thing that I didn't like was the length of the scar that had to be made in the back of my head, roughly seven to eight inches. Everything else was great. The doctor was very nice. I thought he did a good job with the procedure. Everybody told me everything I need to know before and after the procedure takes place.

Everything was explained very well. Answered all of my questions. It was more of an information gathering without any pressure to buy.

Sep 29, 2019

Tammy was excellent at explaining and understanding how this is such a difficult thing to deal with, especially as a woman

Sep 25, 2019

Tammy is phenomenal

Sep 11, 2019

Tammy was great! She showed and talk to me about everything that is involved in the procedure. Very knowledgeable and friendly.

Sep 6, 2019

Tammy was great at presenting options every step of the way and setting expectations. I chose SMP and it looks great. Nice seeing a thicker look, and the procedure was pretty painless, thanks to Dawn.

Aug 14, 2019

Tammy was very nice. She knew the product well and could answer all of the questions. I appreciate having someone who is knowledgeable in Pleasant to deal with

Aug 14, 2019

The specialist did sort of try to play on insecurity (that I did not mention having) by saying something to the effect of if you lose your hair you have nothing. I found this sales pitch to be bit rude and unnecessary since I already indicated on the form and to her directly that I was interested in a transplant. Aside from that, she was funny, knowledgeable and informative.

Jul 29, 2019

Tammy was fantastic and very helpful. She was very informative and helped with every single question I had. She was patient, informative, and showed interest in what she was advertising. Very pleased with my visit

Jul 22, 2019

Shes Awesome!

Sep 22, 2021

The whole team from beginning to the end were very friendly and all had gone above and beyond to help me be comfortable during the entire procedure. They were all professional and so kind in caring for me on my day of surgery. I will never forget How great everyone was to me . I can’t thank them all enough . Thank you again perry .

Sep 10, 2021

Great experience, everyone working at that location went above and beyond to make me comfortable.

Sep 10, 2021

Great experience, everyone working at that location went above and beyond to make me comfortable.

Sep 9, 2021

Dr. Ehrlich and his entire staff at the Chevy Chase, MD location were superb. They went above and beyond to make sure my time there was a success. Their concern and compassion for my well-being were truly above and beyond anything I could have anticipated. They work extremely well together as a team.

Sep 9, 2021

Dr. Ehrlich and his entire staff at the Chevy Chase, MD location were superb. They are all knowledgeable and very experienced. They worked extremely well together as a team. Once you're there having a procedure performed, you will truly understand the undertaking it entails. I left pretty much blown away with how the staff worked their tails off to make sure the procedure went off without a hitch. They are all tremendously hard workers who didn't miss a beat from 8 am to 5:30 pm. The entire procedure was painless solely due to their constant concern to monitor my pain level, the local anesthesia, medication, etc. I have no doubt the procedure will meet my expectations. I 100% would recommend this office to family, friends, and strangers. If you're in the DMV area, this is most definitely the location to visit.

Sep 7, 2021

Still waiting on my 6 month or 1 year follow up

Aug 29, 2021

It was very good, I was a bit bummed that I did not get to see the markings prior to starting the procedure but other than that everything was good

Aug 29, 2021

The technician was great. Made me feel comfortable. The results were good. I have more sessions so that should improve even more. Only 1 day post but will advise how it goes.

Aug 27, 2021

It was a. Intimate experience. All the staff were pleased , helpful, and knowledgeable.

Aug 17, 2021

I WAS IMPRESSED WITH THE PATIENCE THE TECH HAD WHEN GIVING ME MY SHOTS FOR THE HAIR TREATMENTS. I AM NOT A GOOD CLIENT FOR THE SERVICES. HOWEVER, I AM PLEASED WITH THE FULLNESS I HAVE . MY HAIR LINE SEEMS TO BE FILLING IN TOO. THANKS
